trans-unit.source: Allows programmatic access to the HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= image>" name="<input type= image>" href=""></xref> element on the server.
trans-unit.target: Tillater programmatisk tilgang til HTML <xref uid="langword_csharp_<input type= image>" name="<input type= image>" href=""> </xref> element på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Use the HtmlInputImage control to create a button that displays an image.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HtmlInputImage kontrollen til å opprette en knapp som viser et bilde.

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically control the action associated with the HtmlInputImage control by providing an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Du kan kontrollere handlingen som er knyttet til HtmlInputImage-kontroll ved hjelp av en hendelsesbehandling for programmatisk den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick>

trans-unit.source: The coordinates where the user clicks an HtmlInputImage control can be determined by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.X?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.Y?displayProperty=fullName> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> object that is passed as a parameter to the user-defined event handler.
trans-unit.target: Koordinatene der brukeren klikker en kontroll som HtmlInputImage kan beregnes ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.X?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.Y?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>objektet som blir sendt som en parameter til brukerdefinerte hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.Y?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.X?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of HtmlInputImage, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av HtmlInputImage, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne konstruktøren til å opprette og starte en ny forekomst av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>|The "image" literal string.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>| "Bildet" strenglitteral. |</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir justeringen for det <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen i forhold til andre elementer i websiden.

trans-unit.source: Use the Align property to specify the alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control in relation to the other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen Juster til å angi justering for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontrollen i forhold til andre elementer i websiden.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: The alignment of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control in relation to other elements on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Justering av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen i forhold til andre elementer i websiden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alternative text that the browser displays if the image is unavailable or has not been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den alternative teksten nettleseren viser Hvis bildet er ikke tilgjengelig eller er ikke lastet ned.

trans-unit.source: Use the Alt property to specify the text to display when the specified image is not available or has not been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Alt-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises når det angitte bildet er ikke tilgjengelig eller er ikke lastet ned.

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically determine the specified alternative text.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til å bestemme programmatisk angitt alternativ tekst.

trans-unit.source: In browsers that support the ToolTip feature, this text also appears as a ToolTip for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: I nettlesere som støtter funksjonen verktøytips, teksten vises også som et verktøytips for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: The alternative text for the specified image.
trans-unit.target: Alternativ tekst for det angitte bildet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border width for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir kantlinjetykkelsen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Border property to specify the border width for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk kantlinje-egenskapen til å angi kantlinjetykkelse for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is not supported in all browsers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapen støttes ikke i alle nettlesere.

trans-unit.source: Check your browser to determine compatibility.
trans-unit.target: Kontroller nettleseren for å finne kompatibiliteten.

trans-unit.source: The border width, in pixels, for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Kantlinjebredden i piksler for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om valideringen utføres når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: By default, page validation is performed when an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Som standard siden valideringen utføres når en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: Page validation determines whether the input controls associated with a validation control on the page all pass the validation rules specified by the validation control.
trans-unit.target: Siden validering bestemmer om inndata kontrollene som er tilknyttet en validering kontroll på siden med alle bestod valideringsregler som er angitt av kontrollen validering.

trans-unit.source: You can specify or determine whether validation is performed on both the client and the server when an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control is clicked by using the CausesValidation property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi eller fastslå om validering er utført på både klienten og serveren når en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontrollen klikkes ved hjelp av egenskapen CausesValidation.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: To prevent validation from being performed, set the CausesValidation property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: For å hindre at godkjenningen fra utført egenskapen CausesValidation til `false`.

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used in the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick> event to prevent page validation from occurring when a Cancel or Reset button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis i hendelsesbehandlingen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick>hendelse for å forhindre siden validering skjer når en Avbryt eller Reset knapp klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if validation is performed when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control is clicked; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis valideringen utføres når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen er klikket; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes the postback data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Behandler sende tilbake dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method checks to see whether coordinates that represent the location where the image was clicked by the user are part of the postback data for the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadPostData kontrollerer om koordinater som representerer plasseringen der bildet ble klikket av brukeren er en del av sende tilbake dataene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: If coordinates are part of the postback data, then the LoadPostData method registers the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control with the Web page as a control that requires an event to be raised when it is processed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis koordinatene er en del av sende tilbake dataene, og deretter metoden LoadPostData registrerer den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll med websiden som en kontroll som krever en-hendelse når den er behandlet.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The origin coordinates (0,0) are located in the upper-left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Kommer fra koordinatene (0,0) finnes i øvre venstre hjørne av bildet.

trans-unit.source: The LoadPostData method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadPostData brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen identifikatoren for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av alle navneverdier som innkommende.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollens tilstanden er endret som et resultat av tilbakesending; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method is called just prior to rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPreRender kalles like før gjengivelse av <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnPreRender brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick> event is raised when the user clicks an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick>denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick>

trans-unit.source: The coordinates where the user clicks an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control can be determined by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.X?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.Y?displayProperty=fullName> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Koordinatene der brukeren klikker en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontrollen kan beregnes ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.X?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.Y?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper for det <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.Y?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs.X?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> object is passed as a parameter to the user-defined event handler.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>objektet blir sendt som en parameter til brukerdefinerte hendelsesbehandlingen.</xref:System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The origin (0, 0) is located at the upper-left corner of the image.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > (0, 0) kommer i øvre venstre hjørnet for bildet.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Opprettet en hendelse aktiverer hendelsesbehandlingen via en representant.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [NIB: opprettet en hendelse](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).

trans-unit.source: The OnServerClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnServerClick kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ImageClickEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer hendelser for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollerer når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control, when it is clicked, to raise a <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostBackEvent brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll, når den klikkes, opphøye en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick>hendelse.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ServerClick> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A> property is `true`; the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A> method is called using the group of controls specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A>egenskapen `true`; <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A>-metoden ved hjelp av gruppen med kontroller som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ValidationGroup%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.ValidationGroup%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Notifies the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Varsler den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen tilstanden til kontrollen er endret.

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method does not participate in the processing of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control and is included to complete the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> interface implementation.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostDataChangedEvent deltar ikke i behandlingen av den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontrollere og er inkludert for å fullføre den <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler>grensesnitt implementering.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostDataChangedEvent method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RaisePostDataChangedEvent brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: Renders the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control's attributes to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gjengivelser av <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollens attributtene til den angitte <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method resolves the URL set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Src%2A> property, writes the `onclick` attribute of the rendered <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control if the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A> property is `true`, and finally calls the base <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderAttributes løser URL-adresse som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Src%2A>egenskapen skriver den `onclick` attributtet i den gjengitte <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontrollere hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A>egenskapen `true`, og til slutt kaller grunntallet <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl.RenderAttributes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Src%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Src%2A> property is a malformed URL, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Src%2A>egenskapen er en feil utformet URL-adresse, en <xref:System.Web.HttpException>unntak.</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Src%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RenderAttributes method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden RenderAttributes brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere utvide funksjonaliteten til de <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som inneholder utdata dataflyten å gjengi på klienten.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Src*> property contains a malformed URL.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Src*>egenskapen inneholder en feil utformet URL-adresse.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Src*>

trans-unit.source: Occurs on the server when the user clicks an <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer på serveren når brukeren klikker en <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ServerClick event is raised when the user clicks an <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: ServerClick denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location of the image file.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir plasseringen av bildefilen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Src property to specify the location of the image to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk Src-egenskapen til å angi plasseringen for bildet som skal vises i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: If the image is not available, the text specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Alt%2A> property is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Hvis bildet ikke er tilgjengelig, teksten angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Alt%2A>egenskapen skal vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.Alt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use a relative or absolute URL.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke en relativ eller absolutt URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: A relative URL relates the location of the image to the location of the Web page without specifying a complete path on the server.
trans-unit.target: En relativ URL forhold plasseringen for bildet som plasseringen av websiden uten å angi en fullstendig bane på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The path is relative to the location of the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Banen er i forhold til plasseringen av websiden.

trans-unit.source: This makes it easier to move the entire site to another directory on the server without updating the path to the image in code.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det enklere å flytte hele området til en annen mappe på serveren uten å oppdatere banen til bildet i koden.

trans-unit.source: You can use the relative path " `~/` " to refer to the current virtual directory where the page is located.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke relativ bane " `~/` " til å henvise til den gjeldende virtuelle mappen der siden finnes.

trans-unit.source: For example, the value of Src for `<input type="image" runat="server" src="~/abc/d.gif">` on a page in the "XspTest" virtual directory is `<input type="image" src="/XspText/abc/d.gif">`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel verdien for Src for `<input type="image" runat="server" src="~/abc/d.gif">` virtuell mappe er på en side i "XspTest" `<input type="image" src="/XspText/abc/d.gif">`.

trans-unit.source: An absolute URL provides the complete path.
trans-unit.target: En absolutt URL-adresse inneholder den fullstendige banen.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, moving the site to another directory requires that you update the code.
trans-unit.target: Flytter området til en annen katalog krever derfor at du oppdaterer koden.

trans-unit.source: The location of the image file.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av bildefilen.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData*> interface method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.LoadPostData*> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <> </> *> grensesnitt metoden ved å kalle den <> </> *> metoden.

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkelen identifikatoren for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: Samlingen av alle navneverdier som innkommende.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control's state has changed as a result of the postback; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollens tilstanden er endret som et resultat av tilbakesending; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*> interface method by calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.RaisePostDataChangedEvent*> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <> </> *> grensesnitt metoden ved å kalle den <> </> *> metoden.

trans-unit.source: Enables the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control to raise events on postback.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen hendelser til tilbakesending.

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gruppen med kontroller som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen får valideringen når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: Valideringsgrupper kan du tilordne validering Kontroller på en side til en bestemt kategori.

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently from other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: Hver valideringsgruppe kan valideres uavhengig fra andre valideringsgrupper på siden.

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ValidationGroup-egenskapen til å angi navnet på valideringsgruppen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontrollen får valideringen når den legger inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: This property has an effect only when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har en effekt bare når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A>er satt til `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the ValidationGroup property, only the validation controls that are part of the specified group are validated when the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage> control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en verdi for egenskapen ValidationGroup bare valideringen kontrollerer som er en del av den angitte gruppen valideres når den <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>kontrollen legger inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a value for this property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `true`, all validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are validated when the control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for egenskapen og <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A>er satt til `true`, alle kontroller for validering på siden som ikke er tilordnet til en valideringsgruppe valideres når kontrollen legger inn på serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage.CausesValidation%2A>

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"></xref> control causes validation when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen med kontroller som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage"> </xref> kontrollen får valideringen når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng (""), som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.
